model.entities.movableEntity

Class MovableEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.entities.Entity
      • model.entities.movableEntity.MovableEntity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Item, NonPlayerCharacters, Player

    public abstract class MovableEntity
extends Entity
    This class represents a movable entity in the game. This is an entity that's position can change throughout the course of the game, and that can be interacted with by the player.
    Author:
    Divya Patel - 300304450

        Instantiates a MovableEntity.
        Parameters:
        model - the model
        position - of entity
        rotX - x rotation of entity
        rotY - y rotation of entity
        rotZ - z rotation of entity
        scale - size of entity
        id - unique id for networking

      • interact

        public abstract int interact(GameWorld game)
        All movable entities may be able to be interacted with. This method will carry out the relevant interactions with the player, and update the game state (score and progress) accordingly.
        Parameters:
        game - game
        Returns:
        int int
